messages.commandNotEnabled:
The command ``{command}`` is currently not enabled!
 If you believe this is an error, please contact an administrator to get it changed!
messages.roleNotFound:
The role ``{arg}`` cannot be found. Please try again!

**Quick Tip!**
*You can use multiple inputs for entering role information.*
*You can use the ID, Mention, or name!*

**Example:**
`823925370126073876`, `@Owner`, `Owner`
messages.commandNoPermission:
You do not have permission to use the command ``{command}``
 If you believe this is an error, please contact an administrator to get it changed!
messages.channelNotFound:
The channel ``{arg}`` cannot be found. Please try again!

**Quick Tip!**
*You can use multiple inputs for entering channel information.*
*You can use the ID, Mention, or name!*

**Example:**
`823925370126073876`, `#general`, `general`
messages.userNotFound:
The user ``{arg}`` cannot be found. Please try again!

**Quick Tip!**
*You can use multiple inputs for entering user information.*
*You can use the ID, Mention, or tag!*

**Example:**
`823925370126073876`, `@i0`, `i0#0001`
messages.botNotInPluginMode: This command will only work if the bot is ran as a plugin on a Spigot Minecraft Server!

event_ticketCreate.dmToTicketCreatorDescription:
You created a new ticket in the **{guildName}** discord!
 Click the channel to go to it! {ticketCreatedMention}

Please do not mention staff members, help will come as soon as one of our staff members is available! 
Thank you for your patience
event_ticketCreate.ticketCreatedEmbedFieldHeader: Please follow the question format below:
event_ticketCreate.dmToTicketCreatorTicket: {userTag}, You have successfully created a ticket!

event_verify.dmToVerifyDesc: You have successfully verified yourself in the **{guildName}** discord!

event_inviteTracking.trackingMessageContent:
**{userTag}** joined the server, invited by **{inviterTag}**
**Total Invites:** `{inviteCount}`

heapDumpToDiscord.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to get memory and process information. If the bot is running as a plugin, it will display basic server TPS and information too.*

acceptSuggestion.cantFindSuggestion: **{userTag}**, cannot find the suggestion with the message ID of: `{arg}`, please try again.
acceptSuggestion.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Message ID> [note]``

*Use this command to accept a suggestion.*

userInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*The user information command retrieves simple information about the specified user!*

profile.format:
**Format:** ``{command} [user]``

*Use this command to send the profile page of the specified user, or yourself.*

runIngameCommand.logMessage: **{userTag}** has run the command `{command}` through console!
runIngameCommand.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <command>``

*Use this command to run a command through console to ingame!*
runIngameCommand.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you have run the command `{command}` through console!

blacklist_add.userAlreadyBlacklisted: `{userTag}` is already blacklisted from using all discord commands!
blacklist_add.logMessage:
`{userTag}` has been blacklisted by **{punisherTag}**
 With the reason: `{reason}`
blacklist_add.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> [reason]``

*Blacklisting someone means they cannot use any more commands on the discord bot. They will also not be able to create tickets, react to reaction roles, or use any other feature of the bot.*
blacklist_add.messageContent:
You have blacklisted `{userTag}` from using all bot commands.
With the reason: `{reason}`

tebexPackageLookup.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Package ID>``

*You can use this command to lookup information about a tebex package.*
tebexPackageLookup.pkgError: Cannot find that package! Please try again.

MCServerInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Server IP>``

*You can use this command to get information about a specified server address.*

fun_8ball.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Question>``

*Use this fun command to ask the almighty magic 8ball a question! Be aware if you cannot handle the truth!*

ban.logMessage:
**{userTag}** has been banned from the server by **{punisherTag}**
With the reason: `{reason}`
ban.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> [reason]``

*Use this command to ban a user from the discord server. They will need to be unbanned in order to join back! Be careful with who you give the ban hammer to!*
ban.userAlreadyBanned: `{userTag}` is already banned from the server!
ban.messageContent:
You have banned `{userTag}` from the server
With the reason: `{reason}`

factionLeader.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to give the specified user the Faction Leader role in your discord!*
factionLeader.messageContent: **{senderTag}**, you have given **{userTag}** the Faction Leader role!

tebexLookup.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <ign>``

*Use this command to lookup tebex information about a specified Minecraft Player. You must enter their exact ign, it does not need to be case sensitive to work!*
tebexLookup.ignError: Cannot find that Minecraft user. Please try again!

reactionRoles.onReactionDMDescRemoved:
:x: You no longer have the ``{roleName}`` role in the **{guildName}** discord.

*To get the role back, react to the message again!*
reactionRoles.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to start the Reaction Role Creator Wizard in your direct messages. Your Creator will expire with 5 minutes of inactivity.
In Creating a reaction role panel will allow users to react to the specified emojis to obtain, and remove roles from their discord account!*
reactionRoles.onReactionDMDescAdded:
:white_check_mark: You now have the ``{roleName}`` role in the **{guildName}** discord.

*To remove this role, un-react from the message!*
reactionRoles.alreadyCreating: **{userTag}**, you are already creating a Reaction Role Panel. Please check your direct messages to finish creating it! To cancel the creator you can message me `.cancel`
reactionRoles.messageContent: **{userTag}**, Please check your Direct Messages to complete the Reaction Role Creator! Your Creator will expire with 5 minutes of inactivity.

screenshare_add.userAlreadyOnList: `{IGN}` is already on the Screenshare List!
screenshare_add.logMessage:
**{IGN}** has been added to the Screenshare List by {punisherTag}
With the reason: ``{reason}``
screenshare_add.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <IGN> [reason]``

*You can use this command to add someone to the list of users that need to be screenshared.*
screenshare_add.messageContent:
You have added `{IGN}` to the Screenshare List
With the reason: `{reason}`

ticketRemove.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*You can use this command to remove a user from viewing a ticket entirely. This command will only work within a valid ticket. You can always add someone back with the ticket add command!*
ticketRemove.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you have removed the user ``{userRemoved}`` from viewing this ticket!

inviteLeaderboard.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*You can use this command to check the leaderboard for most invited members to the discord server! This leaderboard will only display a maximum of 25 users.*

ticketTopLeaderboard.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*You can use this command to check the leaderboard for most closed tickets in the discord server! This leaderboard will only display a maximum of 25 users.*

serverIP.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*This command displays the server's IP address!*
serverIP.messageContent:
The servers IP is: ``play.serverip.com``

Connect today! Supported versions: ``1.8 - 1.16``

confirmFaction.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <leader> <faction> <rosterSize>``

*Use this command to announce a faction as playing the upcoming map!*
confirmFaction.messageContent: **{senderTag}**, you have confirmed the faction ``{faction}``, with the leader being {userTag}, and their roster size being: ``{rosterSize}`` members.

blacklist_remove.userNotBlacklisted: `{userTag}` is not currently blacklisted from using bot commands!
blacklist_remove.logMessage: **{punisherTag}** has un-blacklisted `{userTag}` from using all bot commands!
blacklist_remove.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to un-blacklist a user from using bot commands, allowing them to use commands, tickets, and other features of the bot again.*
blacklist_remove.messageContent: You have unblacklisted `{userTag}` from using all bot commands.

fun_slap.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to slap the hell out of your friend! Be careful though, they can slap you back!*
fun_slap.messageContent: **{userTag}** slaps the living shit out of you `{slapped}`, Hold the L

warns_list.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to list all the warnings that users have on the discord server. It will order them by highest to lowest!*

gcreate.winnerDmMessage:
Congratulations! You won the giveaway for ``{prize}`` in the **{guildName}**
[Click to see the giveaway]({messageLink})
gcreate.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to create a giveaway to run in a certain channel! Make sure to follow the instructions the bot sends!*
gcreate.alreadyCreating: **{userTag}**, you are already creating a giveaway, check your direct messages to continue filling it out! To cancel your current creator, message `.cancel` to me!
gcreate.messageContent: **{userTag}**, Please check your Direct Messages to complete the Giveaway Creator!

giveawayReroll.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Message ID>``

*Use this command to re-roll the winners of a giveaway!*
giveawayReroll.error: Cannot find that giveaway! Please try again!
giveawayReroll.errorRunning: That giveaway is currently active! Can only reroll finished giveaways.
giveawayReroll.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you have sucsessfully re-rolled that giveaway!

pollCreator.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to create a poll! Make sure to follow all instructions the bot sends!*
pollCreator.alreadyCreating: **{userTag}**, you are already creating a poll, check your direct messages to finish filling it out!To cancel your current creator, message `.cancel` to me!
pollCreator.messageContent: **{userTag}**, Please check your Direct Messages to complete the Poll Creator!

blacklist_list.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to view all the users who are blacklisted from using bot commands!*

mute.roleNotFoundError: **{userTag}**, There was an error getting the muted role. If you do not have a muted role, you can run the command ``.createMutedRole`` and then copy the ID into config.
mute.logMessage:
``{userTag}`` has been muted by **{punisherTag}**
With the reason: `{reason}`
mute.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> [reason]``

*Use this command to mute users from typing in channels. If you do not have a muted role already, you can create one with `.createMutedRole`*
mute.messageContent:
You have muted `{userTag}` from sending messages in the server.
With the reason: `{reason}`

tebexGiftcardCreate.logMessage:
**{userTag}** has created a buycraft gift card!
**Value:** ``{value}``
**Code:** ||{code}||
**Note: ``{note}``**
tebexGiftcardCreate.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Amount> [note]``

*Use this command to generate a tebex gift card! Make sure you have your Tebex Secret entered into config in order for this to work. It will send back the code, so make sure no one who you don't want to see the code can see it!*
tebexGiftcardCreate.error: The Tebex account does not have access to create Giftcards. You must upgrade to Enterprise plan in order to create giftcards.
tebexGiftcardCreate.messageContent:
**{userTag}**, You have created a buycraft gift card!
**Value:** ``{value}``
**Code:** ||{code}||
**Note: ``{note}``**

announce.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <channel> <content>``

*Use this command to make an announcement in a certain channel!*
announce.messageContent: **{userTag}** You have successfully made an announcement in {channel}!

changelog.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <content>``

*Use this command to post a changelog in the changelog channel.*
changelog.messageContent: **{userTag}** You have successfully posted a changelog in {channel}!

accept.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> <role> [content]``

*Use this command to accept someone's application! In order to accept someone, they need to have an application submitted!*
accept.userNoApplicationSubmitted: The user `{userTag}` does not have an application submitted. They must have an application in order to accept them!
accept.defaultResponse: Congratulations! **{userTag}** accepted your application. Contact them on discord in order to finish your application process.
accept.messageContent:
:white_check_mark: You have accepted ``{userTag}``
 with the response: ``{response}``

warn.logMessage:
``{userTag}`` has been warned by **{punisherTag}**
With the reason: `{reason}`
{userName} now has a total of `{userWrns}` warns!
warn.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> [reason]``

*Use this command to warn someone. A warning doesn't actually take action on them, it just makes them aware that they were warned.*
warn.messageContent:
You have warned `{userTag}` With the reason: `{reason}`
{userName} now has a total of `{userWarns}` warns!

ticketClose.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <reason>``

*Use this command to close someone's ticket. This command can only be used in a valid ticket. It will generate logs, and send them to both the ticket creator, and the ticket logs channel!*
ticketClose.messageContent: **{userTag}**, the ticket `{channelName}` will close in 5 seconds. Ticket-Logs will be sent to the ticket creators Direct Messages, and go to the ticket logs channel!

staffClear.userNotStaff: `{userTag}` is not a staff member! Therefore, you cannot remove them. The user needs to have the roles configured in the Movement Tracks section of config, in order to be counted as a staff member.
staffClear.movementMessage: **{userTag}** has been fully removed from the staff team by ``{senderTag}.``
staffClear.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to fully demote a staff member. This command will remove all of the roles that are specified in the Movement Tracks section of config.*
staffClear.messageContent: **{senderTag}** you have removed `{userTag}` from the staff team!

serverInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command}`

*Use this command to display general information about the server.*`
serverInfo.messageContent:
**Server Owner:** {serverOwner}
**Server Region:** `{serverRegion}`
**Member Count:** `{memberCount}`
**Categories:** `{categoryCount}`
**TextChannels:** `{TextChannelCount}`
**VoiceChannels:** `{VoiceChannelCount}`
**Roles:** `{roleCount}`
**Server Creation Date:** `{serverCreationDate}`
**BotPrefix:** `{BotPrefix}`

**Bots:** `{BotCount}`
**Humans:** `{HumanCount}`
**Online:** `{onlineCount}`
**DND:** `{DNDCount}`
**Idle:** `{idleCount}`
**Offline:** `{offlineCount}`

**Server Invite Link:** {inviteLink}

ticketAdd.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to add a user to a ticket. This command will only work in a valid ticket. Adding a user to a ticket will allow them to view the history and all incoming messages from now on.*
ticketAdd.messageContent: **{userTag}** you have added the user `{addedUser}` to the ticket.

warns_clear.logMessage: **{userTag}** has cleared and removed all warns across the server.
warns_clear.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to clear and remove all warnings from storage. Be careful, you cannot undo this and all the warnings will be deleted.*
warns_clear.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you have successfully cleared and removed all warnings across the server.

resign.userNotStaff: **{userTag}** is not a staff member! Therefore you cannot resign them. The user needs to have the roles configured in the Movement Tracks section of config, in order to be counted as a staff member.
resign.movementMessage: **{userTag}** has resigned from the staff team.
resign.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to resign a staff member from the server. It will remove all their roles specified in their Movement Track in config.*
resign.messageContent: **{senderTag}** you have resigned ``{userTag}`` from the staff team.

confirmCell.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <leader> <cell> <rosterSize>``

*Use this command to announce a prison cell as playing the upcoming map!*
confirmCell.messageContent: **{senderTag}** you have confirmed the cell ``{cell}`` with the leader being `{userTag}` and their roster size being `{rosterSize}`

fun_hey.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this fun command to have the bot say hello back to you!*
fun_hey.messageContent: Hello! :wave: **{userTag}** How is your day going? I hope well!!

tebexInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to retrieve the basic information about the tebex server. You must have your tebex secret entered properly in order for this command to work.*

confirmIsland.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <leader> <island> <rosterSize>``

*Use this command to confirm an island playing the next upcoming map!*
confirmIsland.messageContent: **{senderTag}** you have confirmed the island ``{island}`` with the leader being ``{userTag}`` and their roster size being `{rosterSize}`

invite_resetData.logMessage: **{userTag}** has cleared all invite data including the leaderboard!
invite_resetData.format: **Format:** ``{command}``*Use this command to clear all invite data, including the leaderboard!*
invite_resetData.messageContent: **{userTag}** you successfully wiped all invite data!

roles.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to list all the roles that are currently on the server!*
roles.messageTitle: List of all roles on the server

ticketRename.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <name>``

*Use this command to rename a ticket. This command can only be used inside of a valid ticket.*
ticketRename.messageContent: **{userTag}** you have successfully renamed this ticket to `{newName}`!

createVerifyPanel.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to create the verify panel. In order for this to fully work, you need to set the channel properly in config!*
createVerifyPanel.messageContent: To ensure a safe and mutually beneficial experience, all users are required to verify themselves as an actual human. It is your responsibility as a client to read all the rules. Once you agree to them you will be bound by them for as long as you are on this server. When you are done reading them, select the reaction at the bottom to acknowledge and agree to these terms, which will grant you access to the rest of the server.

messageClear.logMessage: **{userTag}** has cleared all the messages in {channel}
messageClear.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to clear all the messages in a channel. Note, if the message is over 14 days old, the bot cannot delete it due to discord limitations!*
messageClear.messageContent: **{userTag}**, You have cleared all the messages in this channel!

screenshare_clear.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to clear the Screen Share List storage! Be careful, this action cannot be undone, and you will lose all data after this is run.*
screenshare_clear.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you have cleared the Screenshare List!

promote.userMaxPosition: **{userTag}** is already the highest role they can possibly be promoted to!
promote.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to promote someone by 1 movement track. Movement tracks are defined in config and have many properties to them. Everytime someone is promoted, they will take the next position entirely, All roles, display names, ect.*

roleInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <role>``

*Use this command to get information about a specified role!*

role_all.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <role>``

*Use this command to give everyone on the server that role*
role_all.noUsersToGive: **{userTag}**, could not apply roles. Everyone already has the role `{roleName}`!
role_all.messageContent: **{userTag}**, You have queued giving the role `{roleName}` to **{userCount}** users. This will take around `{time}` to complete.

reject.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> [content]``

*Use this command to reject someone's application. They must have an application submitted if the `requireAppToBeSubmittedToReject` is true*
reject.userNoApplicationSubmitted: The user `{userTag}` does not have an application submitted. They must have an application in order to accept them!
reject.defaultResponse: If you are still interested in applying, apply again in 2 weeks. Thank you for applying!
reject.messageContent:
:x: You have rejected ``{userTag}``
With the response: `{response}`

removeWarn.userNoWarns: **{userTag}** does not have any warnings! They need at least one warning in order to remove it.
removeWarn.logMessage:
**{punisherTag}** has removed 1 warn from `{userTag}`
{userName} now has a total of `{userWarns}` warnings!
removeWarn.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to remove a warning from a user. They need at least one warning in order to remove them!*
removeWarn.messageContent:
You have removed 1 warn from ``{userTag}``
{userName} now has a total of `{userWarns}` warnings!

reloadConfig.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to reload config after it was changed. Give the bot a few seconds to catch up after you run the command!*
reloadConfig.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you have successfully reloaded the configuration!

invites.format:
**Format:** ``{command} [user]``

*Use this command to check yours, or other users' invites to the server. When someone leaves the server, whoever invited them will lose an invite.*
invites.messageContent: ``{userTag}`` has **{inviteCount}** user invites to the server.

unmute.userNotMuted: ``{userTag}`` is not currently muted, therefore cannot un-mute them!
unmute.logMessage: ``{userTag}`` has been unmuted from sending messages in the server by **{punisherTag}**
unmute.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to un-mute a user from sending messages in the discord!*
unmute.messageContent: You have un-muted `{userTag}` from the server.

fun_coinFlip.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to flip a coin, heads or tails!*
fun_coinFlip.messageContent: **{userTag}** You flipped a coin, and you got a `{flip}`. Hope it was what you we're hoping for!

ticketInfo.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to display information about a ticket. This command can only be used in a valid ticket.*

islandLeader.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to give a user the Island Leader role!*
islandLeader.messageContent: **{senderTag}** you have given `{userTag}` Skyblock Leader role!

getMuted.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to retrieve all the muted users in a server. It will go off of who has the muted role.*

ticketAdminOnly.alreadyAdminOnly: **{userTag}**, this ticket is already in Admin Only mode.
ticketAdminOnly.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to turn a ticket into Admin Only mode. This means any role defined in config to be admin only will be able to see the ticket from then on.*
ticketAdminOnly.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you have changed the ticket to admin only!

blacklist_clear.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to clear and wipe the Blacklisted users storage. Be careful, you cannot undo this!*
blacklist_clear.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you have wiped all Blacklisted Users.

apply.applicationDesc:
Application from: {userMention}
User ID: ``{userID}``
User Tag: **{userTag}**
Time: ``{time}``
apply.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to start an application in Direct Messages. There is a 5 minute timeout for inactivity.*
Questions: What game modes do you play regularly (Factions, Prison, Skyblock) and for how long?
Have you played MCRivals? (When? How long?)
What are your overall thoughts on MCRivals?
Would you be in a position to attend some meetings in voice channels (varying times to accommodate time zones) with staff and devs to discuss new ideas for the server?
Add anything else you’d like to say here:
If the Council is full, would you like to be considered for openings in the future?
apply.submitMessage:
You have completed the application. Type `submit` to submit it to the staff team!

Thanks so much and we’ll be in touch via discord in a few days.
apply.alreadyCreating: **{userTag}**, you are already creating an application, check your Direct Messages to continue filling it out!
apply.messageContent: **{userTag}**, Please check your Direct Messages To complete the application.

memberCount.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to display the member count of the discord server!*

createMutedRole.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to create a muted role. It will return the ID of the role after it is created, so you can enter that into config.*
createMutedRole.messageContent:
**{userTag}**, you have created a muted role with the id of ``{ID}``
Please enter this into config in order for it to work properly.

fun_dice.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to roll a die. Good luck!*
fun_dice.messageContent: **{userTag}**, you rolled a die, and rolled a `{roll}`. Hope it was what you we're hoping for!

avatar.format:
**Format:** ``{command} [user]``

*Use this command to get yours, or another user's discord avatar!*

suggest.SuccessMessage: **{userTag}**, you have successfully submitted a suggestion: `{suggestion}` for the gamemode `{gamemode}`
suggest.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <gamemode> <suggestion>``

*Use this command to suggest a change or addition you want to the server. Make sure you specify a gamemode to submit it for!*

createTicketPanel.ticketPanelDescription: Click to one of the emojis to create a corresponding ticket!

ticketOptions.PanelDescription: General questions, concerns or any support you need.
Tickets that admins and above can see.

createTicketPanel.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to create a ticket panel. Make sure you have all the channels entered properly into config in order for tickets to fully work!*

screenshare_remove.logMessage: **{punisherTag}** has removed `{IGN}` from the Screenshare List!
screenshare_remove.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to remove a player from the Screenshare List. *
screenshare_remove.userNotOnList: `{IGN}` is not on the Screenshare List therefore cannot remove them!
screenshare_remove.messageContent: You have removed `{IGN}` from the  Screenshare List!

screenshare_list.format:
**Format:** ``{command}``

*Use this command to retrieve the list of users on the Screenshare List!*
screenshare_list.messageTitle: List of all players on the Screenshare List

unban.userNotBanned: `{userTag}` is not currently banned. Cannot unban them!
unban.logMessage: ``{userTag}`` has been unbanned from the server by **{punisherTag}**
unban.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to unban a user from the discord server!*
unban.messageContent: You have unbanned `{userTag}` from the discord server!

demote.userNotStaff: `{userTag}` is not a staff member. Therefore cannot demote them!
demote.userMinPosition: `{userTag}` is already the lowest role they can possibly be demoted to!
demote.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to demote someone by 1 track defined in the Movement Tracks section in config!*

tebexTransactionLookup.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <Transaction ID>``

*Use this command to lookup and retrieve information about a transaction that was made on the Tebex Store.*
tebexTransactionLookup.transError: Cannot find that Transaction! Please try again with a valid Transaction ID.

kick.logMessage:
``{userTag}`` has been kicked from the discord server by **{punisherTag}**
With the reason: `{reason}`
kick.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> [reason]``

*Use this command to temporarily kick them from the discord server. They can join back via invite link. If you want to permanently remove them, use the ban command.*
kick.messageContent:
You have kicked `{userTag}` from the discord server
With the reason: `{reason}`

prune.logMessageUser: **{userTag}** has pruned `{messages}` sent by `{prunedUserTag}` in the channel {channel}
prune.messageContentUser: **{userTag}**, You have pruned `{messages}` messages sent by the user `{prunedTag}`
prune.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <# of messages> [user]``

*Use this command to prune messages from everyone, or a specified user.*

cellLeader.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this command to give a user the Prison Cell Leader role.*
cellLeader.messageContent: **{senderTag}**, you have given ``{userTag}`` the Cell Leader role!

fun_pat.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user>``

*Use this fun command to give your friend a pat on the head. Treat them well!*
fun_pat.messageContent: **{userTag}** pats you `{patted}`. Who's a good boy! Cutie Pie!

assign.format:
**Format:** ``{command} <user> <role>``

*Use this command to assign a user to a role group defined in the Movement Track config!*
